Text:
i downloaded this torrent. it also doesn't work (opened for less than a second, then closed again). Then i checked the game on APP STORE. it has a specific requirement for ATi or NVidia graphic cards, WILL NOT WORK on INTEL.

I'm on MacBook Pro with Intel HD graphics. can this be the problem?

anyone with successful attempt to play this game from this torrent please confirm this!! people need to know if it's the graphic cards' or purely crappy torrent crack!
